# Golden Consumer Scenario

- Scenario: kafka-security
- Description: Kafka security/auth metadata with streetlights contract
- Spec: tests/fixtures/asyncapi/public/streetlights-operation-security.yml
- Transport: kafka
- Event: smartylighting.streetlights.1.0.event.{streetlightId}.lighting.measured

These files are generated by `npm run test:golden:update`.
Compatibility tests assert exact output matches to detect generator drift.
